about_the_game:
Add that extra dimension to your creations with this inspiring, emotional and enchanting soundtrack by Irish composer Aedan Gerhart Sherry. Aedan took inspiration from many classic role playing game series such as Final Fantasy, Suikoden, Wild Arms, Grandia and many more. The songs included in this pack can add a real sense of unique personality and character to your creations. Let these original tracks weave with your storyline to form an even more engaging and imaginative world.

Features:

* 14 royalty-free songs
* Music for many ranges of scenes and emotions
* Wav, M4a and Ogg files included
* For use in RPG Maker MV or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

To The Mountains
A Story To Tell
Be Free
There is Always A Way
Breaking Light
There is A Hero in You
Caverns
The World
Darkness Lurks
The Stories We Weave
Eastern Mountain Village
The Language of the Land
Evil Entities
Inspire Through Adventure
